cause.description:
The Save Darfur Coalition's mission is to raise public awareness about the ongoing genocide in Darfur and to mobilize a unified response to the atrocities that threaten the lives of two million people in the Darfur region. An alliance of more than 190 faith-based, advocacy and humanitarian organizations, the coalition's member organizations represent 130 million people of all ages, races, religions and political affiliations united together to help the people of Darfur.
Learn more about the genocide and the Save Darfur Coalition's efforts to stop it by visiting our home page: http://www.savedarfur.org
Raise awareness and support the cause by wearing Save Darfur merchandise: http://yhst-88482264721289.stores.yahoo.net/
For information about the Save Darfur Coalition, including how to donate money directly (such as from a fundraiser) please visit: http://www.savedarfur.org/pages/faq .
1. Protection of civilians from violence, starvation and disease
2. Sustainable peace for all Sudan
3. Justice for victims and accountability for perpetrators
cause.mission: To end the ongoing genocide in Darfur, Sudan.
